website_summaries.verdict: With its easy-fire weaponry, excellent level of detail, and fun mix of heroes and Battle Droids, kids will have a blast reenacting the Clone Wars with this Droid Gunship.
pros: Includes 8 launching missiles and 2 stud launchers
Features 2 Battle Droids, Chewbacca, and Yoda figures
cons: It’s easy to lose those tiny projectiles if you aren’t careful

customer_reviews.title: One very happy six-year old young man!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this LEGO Star Wars set for my six-year-old grandson. It was a Happy New Year gift for him, and he was just thrilled. I will be excited to see the finished product. This is not his first LEGO set.
customer_reviews.author: Ricki Burleigh

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift, my nephew dived right into it and put it together--he absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bascom

customer_reviews.title: LEGO kits are great!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my eight-year-old grandson. I believe he had it completed by the next day. LEGO toys are the only thing that keep him involved for hours on end.
customer_reviews.author: Elwin Ansell

customer_reviews.title: A true party hit! Great set for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This LEGO set is a great set for any child who likes Star Wars! Many pieces but great instructions for easy assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Yates

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the LEGO builder
customer_reviews.text: A few months ago my five year old grandson said he wanted this LEGO set. He loves putting them together and he loves Star Wars just like his Dad and Granddad. So I got it for his recent sixth birthday and with excitement he said "you remembered!". And I was surprised he remembered... Sometimes you get LEGOs that come out tiny but this one is a good size. Not tiny but not so big it won't fit on a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Steve and Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift but challenging
customer_reviews.text: The 9 yr old little one loved this LEGO set but it did take quite a bit of adult help and encouragement along the way.
customer_reviews.author: R. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Packaging unsatisfactory!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. It arrived in an Amazon box but the LEGO box inside was bent and wrinkled. I assume all the pieces will be ok but when you pay $75 for a set and your box is damaged and doesn’t look nice, I don’t feel good about wrapping it as a gift. I realize that kids don’t care about the box but I like even the boxes I put things in as a gift to look nice. I was disappointed in the condition of the box but I am keeping it in hopes that none of the pieces are damaged or missing.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift to my grandson last Christmas. The package says age 8+ and my grandson is 7 years old. He still assembled it with high interest despite he needed a little help from his dad at certain parts. Anyway, he was very pleased with this gift as he is fascinated with space legos.
customer_reviews.author: Grand

customer_reviews.title: Star Wars Home
customer_reviews.text: My grandson will love this, I bought it for a considerable less amount that what is in local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining Legos Kit for son
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old son loves Legos and loves Star Wars so this was naturally a hit. Everything fit perfectly and didn't get up until he had totally completed the kit. It wasn't that complicated at all for his age.
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 3 of my grandsons (ages 10, 10 and 7). They loved it! It took hours to put together and they could work as a team. They live taking it apart and rebuilding it.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam H.

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Legos got too expensive these days. I don't know how they are still in business.
customer_reviews.author: Mudders milk

customer_reviews.title: A great lego set!
customer_reviews.text: Our 8-year-old grandson loved this set. The directions are easy to follow, and he needed no help in assembling it. He loves the movable parts and the design and construction. It was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Nanci

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this set. It was fun to build! One thing to bear in mind is that the gunship doesn't have a good stand, no wheels or anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: zoharste

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my 8 yr old
customer_reviews.text: My son was super excited with this lego set gift. Loads of joy from this one. Arrived in perfect condition and in appropriate timing.
customer_reviews.author: AngePange

customer_reviews.title: Star Wars Lego’s
customer_reviews.text: Way too many small parts. You add something and something falls off of the other side
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jones

customer_reviews.title: The 'adopt a kid' asked for Lego Star Wars, shoes and gloves.
customer_reviews.text: The 'adopt a kid' asked for Lego Star Wars- at this price I could purchase 3. I'm sure he will like them.
customer_reviews.author: Ting

customer_reviews.title: Star Wars Lego
customer_reviews.text: My oldest loves Lego. On amazon, I found the best price. The plus is it was delivered at my front door.
customer_reviews.author: Anna G

customer_reviews.title: Fun to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Our son-n-law received this for his birthday. He had a great time assembling it. He likes it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G

customer_reviews.title: They're legos...
customer_reviews.text: this is a fun set for the Star Wars aficionados among us. The ship is great, the model is accurate, and my boys love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Bird

customer_reviews.title: Fun to Build!
customer_reviews.text: This was fun to build. A lot of pieces and you need to follow the directions step by step.
customer_reviews.author: rena goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Continues the LEGO tradition
customer_reviews.text: LEGO has been a part of our Christmas gifts for several years. The presents 🎁 hit the mark. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Viking

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 sets as gifts for my nephew and friend’s kids, they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: LIKE ALMOST ALL LEGO'S PRETTY GOOD --GIFT FOR GRANDKIDS (PRICEY)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun set
customer_reviews.text: My son loved putting the set together, and the directions were easy for a six year old to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Authentic
customer_reviews.text: My grandson (and his daddy) had a great time assembling it.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Mary Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Legos
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for one of my sons. They have many Star Wars lego sets so this helped complete it. Difficulty was good, he’s 6 and had no issues putting it together himself. Can’t go wrong with legos.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 year old son. He put it together all by himself and he love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry R. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: This is a good Lego set. Four mini figures and the ship for the price is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Briggs

customer_reviews.title: It is a good size piece.
customer_reviews.text: As always Lego(r) puts a great effort in resemblance, but what most impressed my kid was the size. Some pieces and bits that might need a little care as my kid uses it to play not to show off, and these get loose. Any how a good piece.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo M.

customer_reviews.title: Legos are a good toy choice. Kids can never have too many!
customer_reviews.text: A popular Lego Set bought for ten year old boy. He as delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S

customer_reviews.title: Pieces fall off!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the cockpit comes off very easily and the bottom of the gunship falls off VERY easy when played with. Not the best lego set in my opinion, poorly thought out design.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to my son for for christmas and he just loves it. It got him and his dad to spend some quality time bonding with starters legos.
customer_reviews.author: phylicia russell

customer_reviews.title: Droid Gunship
customer_reviews.text: Totally iconic set great detail on droids a nice addition to any clone wars set
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Gift
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old nephew loves it!! It is different to all the other legos he has.
customer_reviews.author: afm160

customer_reviews.title: Lego never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: Just as much fun as any other Lego set. Good enough size.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Mena

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces, don't purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty upset when my son opens his Christmas gift and we can't complete it because there are pieces missing.
customer_reviews.author: J. sims

customer_reviews.title: Lego heaven
customer_reviews.text: It's Lego and my son is an addict so how could you go wrong...
customer_reviews.author: stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson was super excited to receive this. If you have a Star Wars fan this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Zona Watson

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I like longer builds so it was ok but not really for me
customer_reviews.author: caleb edenfield

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it, he had it completely put together in 1 day. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Byers

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but too much
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, but way too much money for how many pieces there are.
customer_reviews.author: Matias Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Kids love legos
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our grandson for his 6th birthday. It is rated 8 and above, he had it completed in less than 24 hours. Legos are great toys!!
customer_reviews.author: ASG

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift for my little guy
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loved this gift. I thought the lego figures were so much better than the ones when I was a kid particularly the droids. Very cool. Snagged on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Tyr Na Nog

product_meta.title: LEGO Star Wars: The Revenge of the Sith Droid Gunship 75233 Building Kit (329 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Set out on exciting missions with the heavily armored LEGO Star Wars 75233 Droid Gunship. As seen in Star Wars: The Revenge of the Sith, this detailed construction toy features an opening cockpit with space for a Kashyyyk Battle Droid figure, lowering landing gear and non-firing directional cannons at the front. Add no less than 8 flick missiles and 2 stud shooters, plus Chief Tarfful and Yoda minifigures to the mix, and you have the perfect recipe for a galaxy of action-packed LEGO Star Wars battles! This building toy includes 2 minifigures and 2 LEGO figures.
feature_bullets: Build a highly detailed Droid Gunship LEGO Star Wars vehicle, packed with stud shooters, 8 flick missiles, and an opening cockpit!
This creative play construction toy includes 2 LEGO Star Wars minifigures: Yoda and Chief Tarfful, plus 2 Kashyyyk Battle Droids
Droid Gunship measures over 1-inch (5cm) high, 11-inch (29cm) long and 9-inch (24cm) wide
329 building bricks – Construction toy set for boys and girls aged 8+ and for fans and big kids of all ages
This LEGO Star Wars Droid Gunship 75233 play set kit includes lots of original LEGO bricks for endless creative building and imaginative play

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars515 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
